status.title: 📊 Bot Status
status.usage_info: You have used {used}/{limit} credits this session

errors_extended.unknown_action:
❌ **Unknown action**

This button action is not recognized. The bot may have been updated since you sent this message.
errors_extended.access_denied:
🔒 **Access denied**

You are not authorized to use this bot.
errors_extended.directory_not_found:
❌ **Directory not found**

The directory `{path}` no longer exists or is inaccessible.
errors_extended.not_a_directory:
❌ **Not a directory**

`{path}` is not a directory.
errors_extended.claude_integration_not_available:
❌ **Claude integration not available**

The Claude Code integration is not properly configured.
errors_extended.file_too_large:
❌ **File too large**

Maximum file size: {max_size}MB
Your file: {file_size}MB
errors_extended.timeout_error:
⏰ **Request timeout**

Your request took too long and timed out.

**What you can do:**
• Try breaking your request into smaller parts
• Use simpler commands
• Try again in a moment
errors_extended.rate_limit_reached:
⏱️ **Rate limit reached**

Too many requests in a short time period.

**What you can do:**
• Wait a moment before trying again
• Use simpler requests
• Check current usage with `/status`
errors_extended.no_conversation_found:
🔄 **Session not found**

The Claude session could not be found or has expired.

**What you can do:**
• Use `/new` to start a fresh session
• Try your request again
• Use `/status` to check your current session
errors_extended.failed_to_send_response: ❌ Failed to send response. Please try again.
errors_extended.export_unavailable:
❌ **Export unavailable**

Session export service is unavailable.
errors_extended.no_active_session:
❌ **No active session**

No active session available for export.

system_errors.auth_required: 🔒 Authentication required. Please contact the administrator.

error_messages.file_format_not_supported:
❌ **File Format Not Supported**

File must be text-based and UTF-8 encoded.

**Supported formats:**
• Source code files (.py, .js, .ts, etc.)
• Text files (.txt, .md)
• Configuration files (.json, .yaml, .toml)
• Documentation files

session.new_session_created:
🆕 **New Claude Code Session**

📂 Working directory: `{path}/`

Ready to start coding with Claude!
session.session_cleared:
✅ **Session cleared**

Your Claude session has been cleared. You can now start coding in this directory!
session.export_complete:
✅ **Export completed**

Your session has been exported as {filename}.
Check above for the full conversation history.
session.session_terminated:
Your Claude session has been terminated.

**Current status:**
• Directory: `{path}/`
• Session: None
• Ready for new commands

**Next steps:**
• Start a new session
• Check status
• Send any message to begin a new conversation
session.continuing_session:
🔄 **Continuing session**

Session ID: `{session_id}...`
Directory: `{path}/`

Continuing where you left off...
session.no_recent_session:
No recent Claude session found in this directory.
Directory: `{path}/`

**What you can do:**
• Use the button below to start a new session
• Check session status
• Navigate to a different directory

help.send_text_tip: • Send any text to interact with Claude
